mapper.select: SELECT id, address, phone, storeName, createdAt, updatedAt, status FROM ctm_store where id=#{id} and status=1
mapper.insert: insert into ctm_store(address, phone, storeName, createdAt, updatedAt, status) values(#{address},#{phone},#{storeName},now(),now(),#{status})
mapper.update: update ctm_store set status=0 where id=#{id}
